title: Fifa’s peace prize and the genocide problem
description: NO-ONE knows whether US President Donald Trump is still sulking under the stairs after the Nobel committee passed over him in selecting their winner of the 2025 Peace Prize (they chose another rightwinger instead, Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado).No-one knows either whether Fifa’s announcement of its own “peace prize,” to be awarded by its president Gianni Infantino during the World Cup draw to be held on December 5 in Washington DC is simply a craven scheme to compensate the sulker in the White House for his Nobel snub.

title: Trump says boat crews are narco-terrorists. The truth is more nuanced, AP finds
description: In interviews in villages on Venezuela's northeastern coast, from which some of the boats departed, residents and relatives said the dead men had been running drugs but were not narco-terrorists.
content:

title: Venezuela: una persona es detenida cada 15 horas en el país, incluyendo menores de edad, según denuncian defensores de derechos humanos
description: Periodistas, estudiantes y niños son detenidos por las autoridades con paradero desconocido por varios días y sin motivos claros. Radiografía.
content:
En octubre se registraron al menos 54 detenciones arbitrarias en Venezuela, incluyendo periodistas, estudiantes y niños. En promedio, se trata de un encarcelamiento cada 15 horas.

title: se encendió la llama bolivariana en Caracas, Venezuela
description: La vigésima edición de los Juegos Bolivarianos comenzará el 22 de noviembre y se llevará a cabo en Ayacucho y Lima.
